info.title: Private API
info.description: Includes `authentication`, statistics, users, groups, roles, tickets and messages application routes.

tags.name: authentication
tags.description: User login, registration and auth logic

tags.name: branches
tags.description: Operations with company branches (List, update, create branches etc.)

tags.name: messages
tags.description: Messages logic, creating and editing messages

tags.name: statistics
tags.description: Collecting statistics related to staff, messages and tickets

200.description: OK, Response contains User Data and AUTH cookie (connect.sid=abcde12345), used to get access to API requests

get.description: Logout current user
Returns one limited list of branches with pagination

post.description: Creates new Branch if it does not exists in db

get.description: Get single existing branch if it exists in db

put.description: Update existing single branch if it exists in db

get.description: Returns one limited list of groups with pagination

post.description: Creates new Group if it does not exists in db

get.description: Get single existing group if it exists in db

delete.description: Deletes group by id and applies default group to users

put.description: Update existing group fields by id

get.description: Get listRoles from roles list with limit and pagination
Get single role by id if exists in db

delete.description: Deletes role, removes all same roles in Users list

get.description: Get listMessages from messages list with limit and pagination
Finds messages by subject, name or surname

post.description: Sends new message to group or branch members

get.description: Finds single message in db by id

get.summary: Get messages by Group Id - Private route
get.description: Finds all messages by provided Group id

get.summary: Get messages by Branch Id - Private route
get.description: Finds all messages by provided Branch id

get.summary: Get messages by User Id - Private route
get.description: Finds all messages by provided User id
Gets users statistics, limited by month set, passed in params and user access level
Gets permissions statistics, limited by month set, passed in params
Gets tickets statistics, limited by month set, passed in params and user access level

cannot_be_done.description: Tickets marked as 'cannot be one at the moment'

get.description: Gets groups statistics, limited by month set, passed in params
Gets messages statistics, limited by month set, passed in params and user access level
Gets tickets statistics, limited by month set, passed in params and user access level
Get list of tickets from db with limit and pagination
Finds tickets by subject, name or surname of the author
Finds single ticket in db by id

put.description: Update existing group fields by id

get.description: Get users list with limit and pagination
Queries users by input string and returns users lists with pagination and limited results
Finds single user in db by id

put.description: Update existing group fields by id

get.summary: Get users history objects by User Id - Private route
get.description: Finds all history records by provided User id, return list with limits and pagination

get.summary: Get users by branch - Private route
get.description: Finds all branch users, return list with pagination and limits

get.summary: Get users by group - Private route
get.description: Finds all group users, return list with pagination and limits

actionTargetModel.description: Action target model`s id, stores id of changed model

actionTarget.description: Target id, stores id of object which was changes

actionType.description: Type of action performed: Update, Delete, Add
